name: Antinite - BETA
description:
Here at Nocrom Studios, we are very proud to present our brand new multiplayer plane fighting simulator. This is a new broad take on the multiplayer genre. Our brand new game, takes you from the seat of a chair, to the nose of a fighter jet. With cargo planes, multiplayer battles, cartoonish styles and Weaponry. 

- By Nocrom Studios 

- Oreo Osborn you know who you are
